import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {createStructuredSelector} from 'reselect' import { auth } from '../../firebase/firebase.utils' import CartIcon from '../cart-icon/cart-icon.components' import CartDropdown from '../cart-dropdown/cart-dropdown.component' import './header.styles.scss' const Header = ({ currentUser, hidden }) => (
SHOP CONTACT { currentUser ?
auth.signOut()} > SIGN OUT
: SIGN IN }
{ hidden ? null : }
) const mapStateToProps = ({ user: {currentUser}, cart: {hidden} }) => ({ currentUser, hidden }) // connect is a HOF being passed down from redux export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Header);
